name: Word Search Puzzle Colorful - Find Hidden Words
name_original: Word Search Puzzle Colorful - Find Hidden Words
description:
Best Word Search game on Apple Store

Game features:
-Infinite play with automatically generated grids
-Reverse word selection
-Continue where you left
-15+ categories
-Update new categories every month
-3 modes : classic, timed, sequential
-Great Graphics, colorful highlights
